Desc.entry: A registered charity that supports people with Alzheimer's disease and other forms of dementia and their carers. Services available include information and advice, information on holidays suitable for people with dementia and for their carers, public lending library, helpline, day care services (including specialist service for younger people with dementia), carers' support groups, training and talks for those caring for and those with dementia. Runs the Dementia Caf√© (see separate entry). Also lobbies for improved services. Resources include meeting rooms with kitchen facilities and audio tapes in community languages. Participates in Alzheimer's Awareness Week in July and World Alzheimer's Day in September. Company limited by guarantee no 2115499. Self or any referral.
